---
applyTo: '**'
---
1. This Project uses laravel framework.
2. Database PostgreSQL is used in this project.
3. Payment gateway used is Midtrans.
4. Image storage uses Cloudinary.
5. Follow the flowcharts in FLOWCHART.md for understanding the main processes in this project.
6. This project uses React.js for the frontend.
7. This project uses localStorage to manage the cart on the client side.
8. This project uses laravel as a API server.
